social_posts.post_text:
⭐️ 🎶⭐️ Back to @laopera for my last two performances (Dec.1, 4) in “Tosca” along with my amazing co-stars- Angel Blue as Tosca and @ryanmckinny as Scarpia. Come see us! 
#michaelfabiano #tenor #tosca #cavarodossi #puccini #laopera #angelblue #ryanmckinny

🎉🥂🎶 Come Party in London
Posted @withrepost • @artsmartorg If you happen to be in London, co-founder and international opera star Michael Fabiano  will sing to support ArtSmart's mission at Café Pacifico, 7-9PM.
Learn more at artsmart.org/auction.

ArtSmart is a non-profit organization whose mission is to transform the lives of youth in under-resourced communities across the US through tuition-free music lessons and mentorship, by paid professional artists.

##artauction #littlegooddeeds #artsmartorg #mentorshipmatters #musicmentorship #mentorshipprogram #musiceducation #501c3

⭐️ Farewell and Thank You @laopera ⭐️ I’ve so enjoyed reprising the role of Cavaradossi with friends and colleagues. And while #angelblue and @ryanmckinny continue on in this run with @gregory_kunde_tenor, today’s my last performance. TOI TOI TOI to the entire cast and LA team… Until we meet again. ⭐️
#michaelfabiano #tenor #tosca #laopera #ryanmckinny #gregorykunde

Thank you to all who came out to support ArtSmart at the @rubinmuseum of Art to kick off the online ArtSmart Auction. The evening featured a performance by co-founder and operatic tenor @tenorfabiano, Board member @lamoooore, co-founder @johnviscardimusic, and mentor @erin.alcorn.sings spoke about the ArtSmart story. Thank you to all who came out to show support in person or in spirit.

There is another chance to support ArtSmart and hear Michael Fabiano sing. If you are near London, reserve seats at Café Pacifico (@officialcafepacifico) in Covent Garden on December 6, 7-9 PM. Learn more at artsmart.org/auction.

#artauction #littlegooddeeds #artsmartorg #mentorshipmatters #musicmentorship #mentorshipprogram #musiceducation #501c3 #cafepacifico

⭐️ TOSCA rehearsals have started! What a joy to reunite with @mariaagresta, my dear friend and colleague with whom I made my debut as Cavaradossi at @operadeparis not all that long ago (June 2021) and who was my Floria at @teatro_real in Madrid. Our run at @liceu_opera_barcelona starts Jan. 4th. AND we have a very special concert in Calabria coming up next week! More on that later. Come see us! ⭐️
#tosca #michaelfabiano #mariaagresta #liceu #operadeparis #teatroreal #tenor #cavaradossi

🎶 🇮🇹 Dear friends and relatives who live in CALABRIA, I will be singing a special performance of Adriana Lecouvreur in my family's homeland of Reggio Calabria on December 17th. Joining me are dear friends @mariaagresta and @carlomontanaroconductor with a very talented cast and production team. The event will start at the Teatro Francesco Cilea at 20:00. Please come. I would like to see everyone :)))

#cilea #adrianalecouvreur #calabria #TeatroFrancescoCilea #michaelfabiano #mariaagresta #carlomontanaro #tenor

Have you already checked out all the incredible auction items on our website?!?

The Art Auction is concluding in just a few days! Don’t miss a chance to support and contribute to ArtSmart’s mission, as well as to get that unique holiday gift you are looking for your loved ones (or for yourself 😉).

ArtSmart is a non-profit organization whose mission is to transform the lives of youth in under-resourced communities across the US through tuition-free music lessons and mentorship, by paid professional artists.

You can help us continue ArtSmart’s impact by donating or bidding in the auction here: https://bit.ly/AuctionArtSmart

Im very proud to announce that I was granted the honorary citizenship of my familial home town of Scilla in our mother land, Italia. I had the privelege to give a speech to our town when accepting this honor, in my rather broken but affectionate Italian and I’m grateful from my heart for life

🎉 VIVA PUCCINI
Today is Puccini’s birthday. In that spirit, I’m saluting all of the women who have shared great Puccini works with me on our world’s great stages…here, I attach some of my ladies, all whom I regard as terrific stewardesses of great music with whom I’ve have the august privilege to share the stage. 

#turandot #tosca #boheme #levilli #madamabutterfly #giannischicchi #larondine #puccini #opera #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #angelagheorghiu #nicolecar #AleksandraKurzak #angelblue #oksanadyka #alexiavoulgaridou #JoyceElKhoury #ErmonelaJaho #ailynperez #sonjayoncheva #mariaagresta

🎶🎨🎭🔥 EXCITED to re-join my Floria, my dear friend, the great soprano  @mariaagresta in our third production of Tosca, along with the villainous Scarpia as interpreted by @zeljkoLucic in the @villalobos production under the baton of @henriknanasi. Come see us starting Jan. 4, 7, 10, 13, 16, 19. Our Jan 16th performance will also be streamed on liceuplus.com

#tosca #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #mariaagresta @lucic_zeljko #rafaelvillalobos

🎉2022 a WONDERFUL YEAR🎉 Debuts, awards and distinctions that I’ll always treasure. 
🎶 Debuts- A double debut in “Turandot” at @opera_roma; Ismaele in “Nabucco” at @teatro_real and Maurizio in “Adriana Lecouvreur.”
🎶 Reprises- “Carmen”- at @operanationalducapitole in Toulouse, at @washnatopera and at @santafeopera.
“Tosca”- at the glorious @metopera and at @laopera. “Eugene Onegin”- @teatrosancarlo. 
🎶 Awards/Distinctions- A “Best Artist Award” from #teatroreal; opening @sfopera at the Opera Ball; distinction of  Honorary Citizen of Scilla Italy awarded. 
🎶 A very special privilege, my invitation to perform in the 150th Celebration of #granteatredelliceu in Act 3 of Turandot along side @sondraradvanovsky and other notable artists.
🎶 A BIG THANK YOU to all the artists who’ve been on this journey with me in 2022.  And a BIG THANK YOU to all the fans of opera throughout the world- without you there is no “opera!”
🎶 Wishing all a Healthy, Happy 2023, filled with all the music you love.
Sending love, Michael xx

#michaelfabiano #tenor #tenorfabiano #puccini #turandot #oksanadyka #sondraradvanovsky #verdi #nabucco #ismaele #annapirozzi #saoiahernandez #bizet #carmen #evazaicik #isabelleonard #tosca #AleksandraKurzak #LucaSalsi #angelblue #Tchaikovsky #eugeneonegin #arturrucinski #elenastikhina #bestartist #adrianalecouvreur #cilea #mariaagresta

🎶🎼🎵 TOSCA- Excited to open in just TWO DAYS Jan. 4th! with @mariaagresta, and @lucic_zeljko in the @rafaelrvillalobos production at @liceu_opera_barcelona, under the baton of #henriknánási. Come see us! Link in bio. 
#tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #mariaagresta #luciczeljko #henriknánási #rafaelvillalobos #puccini #tosca #cavarodossi #scarpia #liceuoperabarcelona #tenor #opera
null

Today is our second performance of Tosca at the @liceu_opera_barcelona. I have the privilege of performing with my dear friend @mariaagresta. 

A few words on our production as many have asked. While the show itself is controversial, it’s important to state that a free marketplace applies to every vehicle in the world, whether it be banking, durable goods, travel, food and drink, our politicians, or yes, art. From ideas come discussion; from discussion comes progress. We can’t know the value of an idea without witnessing its presence in the face of the public and understanding how the market reacts. A free and open society requires ideas of all ilk; at the end of the day, it’s should be the people who choose what to buy in the marketplace. Understanding the consumer’s needs and wants is mission critical to making sure opera remains a staple of what defines culture. 

And above all, in opera, the performer and singer must always be given their best opportunity to showcase their talent. Without that, the marketplace is deprived of the single most important reason to come to opera: great singing. No chance for great singing, no opera. It’s as simple as that. 

Personally, I welcome alternative readings of classic works because the goal of art is to force dialogue, discussion, and debate. Our Tosca production allows me to showcase my voice, unhinged. As it is, people argue the validity of my own talent all the time. This is a consequence of a free marketplace which I embrace. If you like it, buy it. If you don’t, don’t. 

Art is the single most democratic system humans know because individuals freely laud or criticize, admonish or exalt, without the fear of penalty from the state.

As an artist, I can say I’ve worked in amazing shows and terrible shows. So long as I can do my job, demonstrate great singing, and deliver a concept from an artistic team, I feel I have the obligation to do my absolute best. 

This is all to say that ideas and concepts come and go; the opera singer is the constant. We love opera because we love great singing. Great singing is what keeps our art alive, forever.

#opera #freespeech #liberty #alternatives #singing #tosca 

📸 @elenaanacher

⭐️ Puccini’s “Tosca” premiered in Rome 123 years ago today. And since then its stars have continued to shine brightly. It’s been a great pleasure and privilege of my career to take on the role of Cavaradossi in no fewer than 6 productions, currently at @liceu_opera_barcelona. Come see us or watch a Livestream at liceuplus.com on Monday, Jan.16 at 19:00 or 7PM EST. 
⭐️ Here’s a clip of “E lucevan le stelle” from @teatro_real.

#puccini #tosca #cavarodossi #michaelfabisno #tenor #liceu #teatroreal #sanfranciscoopera #metropolitanopera #parisopera #tenor

🎼🎶🎵 TOMORROW’s the DAY! I’m excited LiceuPlus.com will be livestreaming our performance of TOSCA tomorrow, Mon. Jan. 16th at 19:00, 1:00 EST on their subscription platform. Join us- @mariaagresta, @lucic_zeljko, and I promise to deliver an exciting performance under the baton of #henriknánási in the @rafaelrvillalobos production at  @liceu_opera_barcelona. 
#tosca #liceu #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #mariaagresta #luciczeljko #henriknanasi #rafaelvillalobos #cavarodossi #tenor #puccini #granteatredelliceu #operabarcelona #puccini

I love my Maria 
Hope you all are tuning into the live stream

🇦🇺 Opera Australia- @operaaustralia  It’s great to be back! 
🎼 And I’m so happy to perform in “Adriana Lecouvreur” with my dear friend, the great artist, @ermonelajaho who was just named Artist of the Year by the International Classical Music Awards (ICMA). Congratulations Ermonela! 
🎼 We open at the @sydneyoperahouse on Feb. 20. Come join us! Ticket info- opera.org.au 

#Adrianalecouvreur #operaaustralia #sydneyopera #melbourne #ermonelajaho #ICMA #ArtistOfTheYear #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #tenor #sydney #australia

🇦🇺 Awaiting the arrival of @ermonelajaho to join us in rehersal for the @operaaustralia production of “Adriana Lecouvreur” at @sydneyoperahouse starting 20 February. Tickets opera.org.au 
🇦🇺 Here’s a clip from the last time we performed together, last winter in La Bohème at @teatro_real. Really excited that we’ll be performing together once again. 
#operaaustralia #sydneyoperahouse #adrianalecouvreur #ermonelajaho #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano

🎼🌞🎼 So great to be enjoying the summer sun in Australia. I’m looking forward to performing for music lovers in Melbourne and Sydney thanks to @operaaustralia. 
🎼First up, my concert at Melbourne Recital Centre @melbrecital, an architectural gem that is visually stunning with exceptional acoustics. Australian hoop pine covers the walls in facetted pattern, with chandeliers of beautifully curved strips of timber. 
🎼 Have a look at this marvel! Concert takes place 12 February. Tickets opera.org.au 
🎼 Then on to @sydneyoperahouse for performances of “Adriana Lecouvreur” starting 20 February. 
#Australia #MelbourneRecitalCenter  #operaaustralia #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano
Grateful to be in paradise whilst working

Duparc Phidyle 🎶 Really enjoyed playing with @tenorfabiano at home! One of my favourite operatic tenors 🎭 it was an honour to meet you! Amazing voice 

Recorded December 26th 2022

🎼🇦🇺 Thrilled to be back! Looking forward to performing with the  incomparable @ermonelajaho in “Adriana Lecouvreur” starting 20 Feb. at @sydneyoperahouse . But first I make my debut at @melbrecital Melbourne Recital Centre on 12 Feb. 
🎼🇦🇺 I’m so very grateful for the warm and wonderful memories I have of performances for @operaaustralia- “Faust” in 2015, for which I received the Helpmann Award; “Lucia” with @jessicaprattsoprano in 2018; and “Werther” with @elenamaximova_mezzosoprano in 2019. 
🎼🇦🇺 Hope to see you in Melbourne or Sydney! Tickets- opera.org.au

#melbournerecitalcentre #sydneyoperahouse #operaaustralia #adrianalecouvreur #ermonelajaho #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #faust #lucia #jessicapratt #werther #elenamaximova #HelpmannAward
Recital tonight in Melbourne
Happy that my aunt @lauriefabiano and uncle Joe came to Sydney to visit for their first trip down under …. Aussie friends…. Where besides Blue Mountains to I take them?

⭐️ Exciting news… In April and May, I’ll be performing the role of Des Grieux in Massenet’s “Manon” at @liceu_opera_barcelona. It’s a joy to sing this role again, and especially sweet to be surrounded by a team of wonderful colleagues, including my dear, dear friend- @nadine.sierra. It’s a privilege to perform this role in a house- and to an audience- that have been so welcoming. Thank you Liceu! Thank you Barcelona!  Come see us! 
Dates: April 20, 22, 24, 27, 30;  May 3. 

#Massenet #Manon #ManonLiceu #DesGriex #NadineSierra #MichaelFabiano #tenorfabiano #olivierpy #alexandreduhamel #laurentnaouri #marcminkowski

NEWS: I’ll be singing Des Grieux in Massenet’s Manon opening April 20 at @liceu_opera_barcelona … @nadine.sierra my dear friend is my partner in crime and we look forward to seeing you at the premiere and beyond. 

#nadinesierra #manon #priest #passion #tonguekiss
I am resolutely against banning the combustion engine. What are your thought? @teslamotors @ford @toyota @cnn @foxnews

Took me a while to fly from Sydney 🇦🇺 to Vienna 🇦🇹. I’m here now and looking forward to singing in “Tosca” with the great @krassimirastoyanova in the role of Floria Tosca, and with my esteemed colleagues- @lucabaritono Luca Salsi as Baron Scarpia, Clemens Unterreiner as Cesare Angelotti, Wolfgang Bankl as Sacristan, Andrea Giovannini as Spoletta, Hans Peter Kammerer as Sciarrone, and Marcus Pelz as Jailer. All under the baton of Marco Armiliato at @wienerstaatsoper.
Performances- March 25, 28, and 31.
Come see us! Details in link in bio. 
 
#puccini #tosca #krassimirastoyanova #lucasalsibaritono #marcoarmiliato #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #clemensunterreiner #cesareangelotti #wolfgangbankl #andreagiovannini #hanspeterkammerer #marcuspelz #viennastateopera #wienerstaatsoper

⭐️ Fast Approaching- I’m here in Vienna to sing at the @wienerstaatsoper in “Tosca” with the great soprano @krassimirastoyanova along with the superb @lucabaritono Luca Salsi, all under the baton of Marco Armiliato. 
⭐️ Come see us! Mar 25, 28, 31. A few tickets remain- see link in bio. 

#puccini #tosca #krassimirastoyanova #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #cavarodossi #LucaSalsi #scarpia #MarcoArmiliato #wienerstaatsoper #viennastateopera

🏋🏼💪😅Taking a break! Gearing up for my performances in TOSCA @wienerstaatsoper (March 25, 28, and 31), and my run of MANON @liceu_opera_barcelona starting in April. Great colleagues, great houses, great orchestras, great conductors- what more could a tenor want? YOU! Hope you can make one of the shows!

#tosca #puccini #cavaradossi #wienerstaatsoper #massenet #manon #desgrieux #liceuoperabarcelona #gym #workout #tenor #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano

⭐️ A year ago today, I made my debut as Calaf in “Turandot” at @opera_roma, a very special moment for me, as it was also my house debut. That, in turn, led to the invitation to perform at the 175th Anniversary Celebration at @liceu_opera_barcelona, singing the Riddle Scene with @sondraradvanovsky, and to my closing the ceremonies with “Nessun Dorma” as a tribute to all the Liceu’s workers and artists over the years. 

⭐️ This summer I will reprise the role of Calaf at @teatro_real. It’s a role I hope to perform many times in the years to come. 

⭐️ Thank you to all my talented colleagues in my initial foray into this iconic Puccini opera- including @oksanadyka, @francescadotto, @lyniv.oksana in Rome.

#puccini #turandot #calaf #debut #anniversary #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano

⭐️ OPENING NIGHT! TOSCA @wienerstaatsoper! Cavaradossi and I are  ready to see those seats filled! What an honor to perform with the great @krassimirastoyanova as Tosca, along with the superb @lucabaritono as Scarpia. All under the baton of #marcoarmiliato. 
⭐️ Come see us! Mar 25, 28, 31. Ticket link in bio. 

#puccini #tosca #krassimirastoyanova #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #LucaSalsi #MarcoArmiliato #wienerstaatsoper #viennastateopera #cavaradossi

⭐️ Once More…for TOSCA at Wiener Staatsoper, the last of our run, tomorrow, Mar. 31st.
⭐️ It’s been an honor to perform in this Puccini’s masterpiece along side esteemed colleagues- Krassimira Stoyanova in the title role, with @lucabaritono Luca Salsi as Scarpia, @clemensunterreiner  as Angelotti, @wolfgang.bankl  as Sacristan, @andreagiovanninitenor as Spoletta, Hans Peter Kammerer as Sciarrone, Marcus Pelz as Jailer; under the baton of famed conductor Marco Armiliato. 
⭐️ The iconic production by Margarethe Wallmann, with scenic and costume designs by Nicola Benois, has stood the test of time since 1958. It’s particularly endearing to me that my mentor, dear friend and colleague, the tenor great Neil Shicoff, had previously worn the very same costume as I have for this run. 
⭐️ Thank you Vienna for your open arms warm reception. Until the next time…
📸Wiener Staatsoper/Michael Pöhn 

#puccini #tosca #krassimirastoyanova #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #LucaSalsi #MarcoArmiliato #wienerstaatsoper
Last show tonight @wienerstaatsoper

Thank you so much for your time and your inspiring inputs, Michael!

🎉 Happy Birthday Chairman Shirley! Recent @opera.news Awards winner, recipient of the @neaarts National Endowment for the Arts Award, legendary tenor, mentor, teacher, friend, and Chair of the Board of @artsmartorg ArtSmart. I am profoundly grateful to you @georgeshirley60! 

#GeorgeShirley #legend #metopera #tenor #OperaNews #nationalendowmentforthearts #artsmart #mentor #teacher #tenorfabiano

ArtSmart is proud to partner with Opera San José (@operasanjose), in our endeavor to help support arts education in the South Bay.

Come celebrate with us!
Great food - open bar - fabulous auction items and a must-see concert!
Join us to hear world famous operatic tenor and ArtSmart co-founder Michael perform alongside the Opera San José Resident Artists. The evening will also include a mini-masterclass with Michael, General Director Shawna Lucey, and star of OSJ’s Tosca, Maria Natale.
Don’t miss out on this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to witness how opera comes to life!

Michael has made it his mission to help promote arts education for all and to help build the pathways from musical mentorship to musical performance. 
 
To be able to be a part of our partnership launch, please purchase your tickets today for our Arts for All event happening on Saturday, May 6, 2023 at 4:30pm, at the Arts for All page linked in our bio.

#tenorfabiano #mentorshipmatters #musicmentorship #musicmentoring #newpartnership #artsforall

With my duckie having fun 🦆 @tenorfabiano

@artsmartorg is proud to kick off our new partnership with Opera San José ( @operasanjose ) and we are featuring a silent auction replete with enticing items.

Go to 👉https://go.rallyup.com/arts-for-all/Campaign/Details 👈 (also linked in bio) for a chance to get :

✨An opportunity to take to the skies above San Francisco with licensed pilot and international opera superstar Michael Fabiano.
✨Closer to home, you can experience a one-on-one manicure of your dreams with Opera San José General Director Shawna Lucey, 
✨A behind-the-scenes look at San Francisco Opera’s upcoming summer production of Madama Butterfly,
✨An 8-Day European Viking River Cruise 
✨A private at-home concert with OSJ artists
✨A non-singing role in Opera San José’s new production of Romeo & Juliet and the opportunity to be directed by Shawna Lucey
 
Your bid not only is the chance for one of these once-in-a-lifetime experiences, but is critical to our effort to makemusic and singing possible for the children of San José.

Michael Fabiano is not only one of the most sought-after tenors in the industry, he is also the co-founder and executive director of Art Smart, an organization that provides youth in under-resourced communities across the US through tuition-free music lessons and mentorship by paid, professional artist. And on his days off he likes to pilot planes! Fabiano is also on the 100th Anniversary Concert happening on Friday, June 16. 

Here he is singing the iconic tenor aria E lucevan le stelle from Puccini’s tragic drama Tosca.

Visit link in bio to learn more and to purchase your tickets to this once in a century event!
General tonight @sfopera

Excited to sing my first Butterfly in 14!!!! Years. Imagine. I was 25 when I last sang Pinkerton. I’m not a stitch away from 40. Excited to share this role with all of you @sfopera 

There are only eight shows. Tickets are already almost sold out. If you want to greet me after, tell me which night you’re coming in the comments so I can say hi at the door. 

#opera #butterfly #puccini #love #amore #morte #harikari #blood #guts

EXCITED to sing my first Pinkerton in 14 years! In a visionary new production by Amon Miyamoto of the Puccini’s masterpiece, “Madame Butterfly,” with a really terrific cast at @sfopera San Francisco Opera. Come see us- or tune in for the livestream on June 9th. 

DATES- June 3, 6, 9 (livestream), 18, 21, 24, 27.  Tickets- see link in bio. 

CAST- Karah Son (Butterfly), Hyona Kim (Suzuki), @lucasmeachem (Sharpless), Julius Ahn (Goro); and a stunning Chorus and Orchestra under the baton of Music Director @eskconductor Eun Sun Kim.

Look forward to seeing you!

🎶 Ah! Madrid! I’m delighted to be back! And very excited to perform the role of Calaf- for just the second time- in the stunning Robert Wilson @bob___wilson production of “Turandot.” All starting July 4th! 
🎶 My ninth production at Teatro Real @teatro_real, I am blessed to be joining an excellent cast, among them @ewa.plonka  as Turandot, @ruth_iniesta as Liu, all under the baton of Maestro @nicolaluisotti_conductor with whom I’ve performed 10 times. Come see us! Details in bio.

Always wonderful when family and friends come to support you!  Here’s my wonderful Mom, @cfabiano321, pictured with me in the theater just before my 3rd TURANDOT  performance at @teatro_real! Thanks for coming Mom! Love you! ❤️

#TeatroReal #mom #bestmom #tenorfabiano #madrid
null

🎶 The current production of “Turandot” marks 11 years of performance at @teatro_real. So happy to be performing in front of Madrid audiences which I’ve loved ever since my 2012 debut in “Cyrano de Bergerac.” 

🎶 As I look back, one performance in particular stands out- the groundbreaking production of “La Traviata” when Teatro Real threw open the doors to the world opera after two years of being shuttered; all proving that live performance COULD be staged when the right safety protocols were in place. It was a GUTSY move. And as I said at the time, I applaud the Teatro Real management, I applaud my colleagues who participated, and I very much applaud the more than 24,000 patrons who came to see us during the run. It was an example that needed to be set for the live performing arts. And it took courage. 

🎶 Many wonderful memories with dear friends and colleagues here at Teatro Real combine to make Madrid a city that I love. Last summer, I debuted in the role of Ismaele in “Nabucco” with an outstanding cast, preceded by “La Bohème” with the extraordinary @ermonelajaho Ermonela Jaho and @lucasmeachem Lucas Meachem; “Tosca” with @mariaagresta Maria Agresta; “Un Ballo in Maschera” with @anna_pirozzi_soprano Anna Pirozzi and @arturrucinskibaritone Artur Rucinski. And all that preceded by “Giovanni D’Arco,” and “I Due Foscari, where I shared the stage with @placido_domingo Placido Domingo and @angelameadesoprano Angela Meade! It’s been an amazing 11 years. 

🎶Come see one of our Turandots this July. And now that I can officially call Madrid my home, I look forward to seeing you for many seasons to come.

#TeatroReal #madrid #turandot #nabucco #tosca #boheme #balloinmaschera #LaTraviata #giovannidarco #foscari #cyranodebergerac #tenor #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #opera

Joyce and Michael 😊

I stand with Israel. The barbaric axing of the heads off of infants, the purposeful abductions of Holocaust victims, and the direct attack on innocent civilians should never, ever stand. Saying otherwise is weakness and pure evil. 

On 9/11, our country was terrorized by Islamic fundamentalist terrorists. We knew then what terror was and we certainly know what it is today. 

For a free world, purposeful targeting and killing of the innocent is terrorism. And it must be defeated. 

May we resolve to unite behind ideals of freedom and justice and may god bless Israel in this horrific time

Récital exceptionnel de Michael Fabiano !

Le grand ténor américain d’origine italienne triomphe dans Verdi, Donizetti ou Puccini sur les plus grandes scènes du monde. Invité-surprise du Capitole en 2022, où il chante au pied levé le Don José de Carmen, @tenorfabiano revient pour un récital exceptionnel de mélodies françaises, servies par sa musicalité accomplie et son incroyable élégance.

Événement à ne pas manquer le dimanche 19 novembre ! 

Tarif unique 20€

📸 Michael Fabiano © Jiyang Chen

Récital unique en France ! 

En janvier 2022, @tenorfabiano a fait des débuts toulousains fracassants en chantant Don José au pied levé dans Carmen. La star des ténors américains est de retour au Capitole le 19 novembre pour un récital exceptionnel dédié à la mélodie française.

Réservez vite vos places ! 
🔷️ Tarif unique 20€

🎥 "La fleur que tu m'avais jetée" par Michael Fabiano, dans Carmen, Théâtre du Capitole, janvier 2022

#operanationalducapitole #saisoncapitole2324 #michaelfabiano

👻😈🔥HALLOWEEN TRIBUTE-
Remembering my deals with the DEVIL from my first Faust production at #dutchnationalopera in 2014 with @irinalungu5 to Faust at @royaloperahouse ROH in 2019, and the iconic Robert Carsen production of Mefistofele at @metopera with @angelameadesoprano in 2018! Lesson learned- don’t make deals with the devil! 🔥

Michael Fabiano, c'est dimanche et en français !

Ce dimanche, récital exceptionnel du grand ténor américain @tenorfabiano ! Pour l'occasion, il a souhaité rendre hommage à la mélodie française qu'il adore. Gounod, Liszt (sur des poèmes de Hugo) et Duparc, son favori, auquel il consacrera toute sa deuxième partie.

Une "Invitation au voyage" à ne pas manquer !
🔹 Dimanche 19 novembre à 16h
🔹 Tarif unique 20€
🔹️ Durée 1h30 avec entracte 

📸 Michael Fabiano © Jiyang Chen

🎉 I’m HONORED to perform the role of Calaf starting Nov. 26th in the legendary Núria Espert production of TURANDOT at @liceu_opera_barcelona. It’s particularly special because the production was commissioned to celebrate the re-opening of El Liceu after its catastrophic fire in 1994. And because it is now being directed by #Bárbara Lluch, granddaughter of the original designer. 
🎉 Additional info in bio and at https://www.liceubarcelona.cat/en/turandot

#turandot #calaf #verdi #michaelfabiano #tenorfabiano #liceu #barbaralluch #singersofinstagram

🎉 OPENING NIGHT of TURANDOT is here! At @liceu_opera_barcelona! Sunday, Nov. 26th! Join me and the esteemed cast of @Elena Pankratova as Turandot, @Siegfried Jerusalem as the Emperor, @marko.mimica as Timur and @vannina_santoni_soprano as Liù, as we take part in the legendary @NuriaEspert  production, under the direction of her granddaughter, the talented @BarabaraLluch. Toi Toi Toi to our wonderful team! 
🎉 Link in bio for ticket info or 
https://www.liceubarcelona.cat/en/turandot

Michael Fabiano invites you to join him in supporting ArtSmart today for Giving Tuesday. You can help light the path for students in under-resourced communities through music mentorship and education. $5, $10, $25– everything helps! 

How to donate:
⭐️ onecau.se/powerofmusic
⭐️ Text “powerofmusic” to 243725
⭐️ Visit ArtSmart.org/donate
⭐️ Follow @artsmartorg and donate on IG or FB

Help us light the path toward academic, economic, and emotional stability for all students. Our data shows that 86% of ArtSmart students feel that music gives their life purpose.

“When you have your one-to-one lessons, it’s only you and your teacher. His focus is on you. Every time I have lessons with him, I feel like I am learning more and more. ArtSmart is not just about learning technique or music. ArtSmart is more about connecting the music to your soul.” -Abner Bonifacio

Tonight is our second performance of Turandot @liceu_opera_barcelona. Giving thanks to some of the amazing women associated with our production. From the eminent conductor @alondradlp Alondra de la Parra; to our director @barbaralluchmoreno Barbara Lluch, who with her grandmother #Nuria Espert the designer of the original production, has created our current version; to #ElenaPankratova, our fantastic Turandot; and to our heartbreaking Liu, @vannina_santoni_soprano Toi Toi Toi for tonight’s performance! And thank you to everyone at El Liceu for this glorious production!

#puccini #turandot #liceu #barcelona #nuriaespert #barbaralluchmoreno #AlondraDeLaParra #elenapankratova #vanninasantori #calaf #tenorfabiano #michaelfabiano #singersofinstagram #thankyou

Just a post of gratitude
Thank you to my colleagues, friends, and family for all the love and care this year. I’ve finished off the last engagement of the season (except my New Year’s concert) and the energy of my team, friends, and fans is deeply appreciated. A big thanks to @victorgarciadegomar … what a year at the @liceu_opera_barcelona … unreal frankly and deeply appreciated. 

When I witness 15 sold out Turandots in Barcelona, one of the largest theaters in Europe, in an historic, gorgeous production. I know that our art form is and will always be an anchor of the civic good. We must defend it. We must support it. We must serve it. The people want opera; we have to give them the best there possibly can be without exception. THAT is our responsibility to remain a cultural anchor for generations. Great artistry, great music, great theater, great great great. Nothing else. No nonsense. No BS. No excuses. We can do it! Anything less means our art form will die. 

Let’s continue our March for greatness over all else 

My love to you all

✨In this time of strife, let’s take a moment to reflect on the goodness in the world, goodness which each of us is capable of passing on to others in our everyday lives.
✨ Wishing you and your loved ones many blessings for the holiday season and for the upcoming year.
Sending love. xxx

🎉🥂🍾🎉🥂🍾🎉🥂🍾🎉🥂🍾🎉🥂

It’s a musical feast to delight all opera lovers! Join us! And all good wishes for a wonderful New Year! Ticket info in bio 🥂
